TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TableRow extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl

span.span: Represents a row in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 类表示中的行控件。The class represents a row in a control. 此类可以控制如何显示行的内容。This class allows you to control how the contents of the row are displayed. 通过设置指定的行中内容的对齐方式和属性。The alignment of the contents in the row are specified by setting the and properties. 你可以通过使用以编程方式管理行中的单元格集合。You can programmatically manage the cells in the row by using the collection. 集合是一系列表示的单元格的行中的对象。The collection is a collection of objects that represent the cells in the row. > [!CAUTION] > 控件可用于显示用户输入，这可能包括恶意客户端脚本。The control can be used to display user input, which might include malicious client script. 检查从客户端的可执行脚本、 SQL 语句或其他代码之前发送应用程序中显示的任何信息。Check any information that is sent from a client for executable script, SQL statements, or other code before displaying it in your application. ASP.NET 提供了用户输入到脚本块和 HTML 的输入的请求验证功能。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 验证服务器控件还提供用于评估用户输入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 验证控件](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fa2aa14d-a461-492e-9a79-c990904613ef)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Validation Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fa2aa14d-a461-492e-9a79-c990904613ef). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ```                   ``` ## Examples 此下面的代码示例创建一个表，以编程方式将元素添加到表中，并在网页上显示的表。This following code example creates a table, programmatically adds elements to the table, and displays the table on the Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[TableCell#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TableCell/CS/tablecellcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TableCell#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TableCell/VB/tablecellvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取 对象的集合，这些对象表示 控件中的行的单元格。

span.span: Gets a collection of objects that represent the cells of a row in a control.

value.span: 对象，表示 控件的行的单元格集合。

span.span: A object that represents a collection of cells from a row of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性以编程方式控制的集合对象表示的单元格的行的控件。Use this property to programmatically control a collection of objects that represent the cells from a row of the control. 可以以编程方式添加、 插入或删除集合中的对象。You can programmatically add, insert, or remove a object from the collection. > [!NOTE] > 在生成时才使用此属性以编程方式控制。This property is only used when building controls programmatically. 在设计时，此属性设置通过声明对象。At design time, this property is set by declaring objects. ## Examples 此下面的代码示例创建一个表，以编程方式将元素添加到表中，并在网页上显示的表。This following code example creates a table, programmatically adds elements to the table, and displays the table on the Web page. summary.span: 获取或设置行内容的水平对齐方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the horizontal alignment of the contents in the row.
One of the values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定行的内容的水平对齐方式。Use the property to specify the horizontal alignment of the contents of the row. 下表列出了可能的值。The following table lists the possible values. |水平对齐方式Horizontal Alignment|描述Description| |--------------------------|-----------------| ||未设置水平对齐方式。The horizontal alignment is not set.| ||行的内容左对齐。The contents of the row are left justified.| ||行的内容居中。The contents of the row are centered.| ||右对齐的行的内容。The contents of the row are right justified.| ||行的内容均匀分布，并且与左右边距对齐。The contents of the row are uniformly spread out and aligned with both the left and right margins.| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性。The following example demonstrates how to use the property. 有关完整的工作代码示例，请参阅类概述主题。For a complete, working code example, see the class overview topic. [!code-csharp[TableCell#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TableCell/CS/tablecellcs.aspx#4)] [!code-vb[TableCell#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TableCell/VB/tablecellvb.aspx#4)]

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示在控件的 属性为 时，控件是否应将呈现的 HTML 元素的 特性设置为 "disabled"。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the control should set the attribute of the rendered HTML element to "disabled" when the control's property is .

value.span: 如果属性指示 ASP.NET 版本低于4.0; 否则为。

span.span: if the property indicates an ASP.NET version lower than 4.0; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指示如何 ASP.NET 应呈现 HTML 控件的控件处于禁用状态时。This property indicates how ASP.NET should render HTML for a control when the control is disabled. 如果此属性为`true`，ASP.NET 会将`disabled`属性时控件处于禁用状态。If this property is `true`, ASP.NET renders a `disabled` attribute when a control is disabled. 如果此属性为`false`，ASP.NET 会将`class`属性时控件处于禁用状态。If this property is `false`, ASP.NET renders a `class` attribute when a control is disabled. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件中 对象的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the location for a object in a control.
A value.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来获取或设置位置的对象置于控件。Use the property to get or set where the object is placed in a control. 有关可用的表位置，请参阅。For the available table locations, see . 下表列出了可能的值。The following table lists the possible values. |表行部分Table row section|显示为Displayed as| |-----------------------|------------------| ||标头行中。The header row.| ||在表的正文。The body of the table.| ||脚注行中。The footer row.| 使用声明性语法时，部分必须按顺序标头、 正文和页脚。When using the declarative syntax, the sections must be in the order of header, body, and then footer. 枚举，你可以构建使用可访问网站通过添加控件``， ``，和``呈现给客户端的 html 元素。The enumeration enables you to build accessible Web sites using the control by adding the ``, ``, and `` elements to the HTML that is rendered to the client. 如果在表中的所有行都都在``元素中，部分信息不呈现。If all rows in a table are in the `` element, the section information is not rendered. 非正文元素中必须至少有一行。At least one row must be in a non-body element. 此属性的值存储在视图状态。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来定义中的页眉和页脚行控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to define header and footer rows in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[TableRow#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TableRow/CS/TableRowCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TableRow#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TableRow/VB/TableRowVB.aspx#1)]

span.span: The is not valid.

summary.span: 获取或设置行内容的垂直对齐方式。

span.span: Gets or sets the vertical alignment of the contents in the row.
One of the values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定行的内容的垂直对齐方式。Use the property to specify the vertical alignment of the contents of the row. 下表列出了可能的值。The following table lists the possible values. |垂直对齐方式Vertical Alignment|描述Description| |------------------------|-----------------| ||未设置的垂直对齐方式。The vertical alignment is not set.| ||行的内容与行的顶部对齐。The contents of the row are aligned with the top of the row.| ||行的内容与行的中间对齐。The contents of the row are aligned with the middle of the row.| ||行的内容与行的底部对齐。The contents of the row are aligned with the bottom of the row.| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性。The following example demonstrates how to use the property. 有关完整的工作代码示例，请参阅类概述主题。For a complete, working code example, see the class overview topic.
